title: Penalty to players that continuously doesn't click "ready" when a game has been found?
body: Was wondering if such thing is applicable since there are so many players got in queue and afk doing something else, what originally was a 2mins queue has been prolonged to 12mins queue. Annoying AF.{{champion:103}}

replies.body: If you decline/ fail to accept so many matches in a row (not sure the exact number, but its around 5) then you get a queue timer before you can join.
thanks for clarifying, seems like we got that penalty already
aye? the typical toxic comment aye
not gonna make the game better if we jst let things happen the way they are now right? oce is already shit lets try make it better :)
